name: Springs Awakening
description: (Game made for the Unreal Spring games Jam) Within this the game the  player has just woken from hibernation (torpor) with its cub, you must survive together from the world of bears and vikings and starvation. As the player survives the Cub will grow and will require more from the player. After 31 days the player has cared for the cub long enough and they can look after themselves now.
